title: Failed to create mining context   err="missing trie node xxxxxx (path )"
body:
Hi there,
    When I use the program to continuously commit transactions,  Why does it appear ` Failed to create mining context          err=missing trie node  xxxx`.  **who can tell me ?  Thanks!**

- System information
```shell
prod@AWS-NX-15-002:~/deploys$ geth version
Geth
Version: 1.7.3-stable
Git Commit: 4bb3c89d44e372e6a9ab85a8be0c9345265c763a
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.9.2
Operating System: linux
````
- Error console
```
prod@AWS-NX-15-002:~/deploys/$ geth attach http://127.0.0.1:8545
Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

instance: Geth/v1.7.3-stable-4bb3c89d/linux-amd64/go1.9.2
coinbase: 0xd2764136d6fae4e5344cc51a58f2a643970d3d1d
at block: 76185 (Tue, 31 Jul 2018 17:12:21 CST)
 datadir: /home/prod/deploys/data20180719
 modules: admin:1.0 eth:1.0 miner:1.0 net:1.0 personal:1.0 rpc:1.0 txpool:1.0 web3:1.0

> eth.getBalance(eth.coinbase)
Error: missing trie node ff354885bd551ad1f5dfa42e1ca05298fd035b33c93ef0a16f8f1ec1174c8f8d (path )
    at web3.js:3143:20
    at web3.js:6347:15
    at web3.js:5081:36
    at <anonymous>:1:1

> 
```

That's a 14 release old release. Please use a fresh version. Btw, it seems as if your db is corrupted.
